name: 曾柏軒
objective: 1.Complex Numbers 2.Complex Functions 3.Harmonic Functions 4.Complex Integration 5.Cauchy Theory of Integration 6.Complex Power Series 7.Laurent Series,Residues 8.Conformal Mapping
schedule:
課程主題：
1. Complex Numbers
2. Analytic Functions
3. Elementary Functions
4. Integrals
5. Series
6. Residues and Poles
7. Applications of Residues
8. Mapping by Elementary Functions
9. Conformal Mapping
materials:
Complex Variables and Applications (9th Edition), Brown, Churchill

課程網頁: http://www.cc.ntut.edu.tw/~phtseng/course.html
